name: LuxCloud
tag_list: cloud, saas, provisioning, value-added-reseller, automation, hosting
overview:
LuxCloud, founded in 2010 and headquartered in Luxembourg, was created in order to offer a full SaaS (Software as a Service) distribution environment. LuxCloud offers a powerful automation platform designed to help Software Vendors publish their SaaS applications, also supporting Service Providers, Telecom Operators and Resellers to commercialize the applications on offer.

LuxCloud is a market leader in the provisioning of cloud computing services, allowing companies to quickly launch and profitably deliver the cloud services demanded by small and medium sized businesses. LuxCloud offers customizable, own branded solutions, utilizing a cloud platform to automate back office tasks involved in the selling of SaaS. This cloud infrastructure provides sales order placement, service provisioning and management of service billing; allowing fast time-to-market, greater flexibility and a low investment risk.

LuxCloud targets Software Vendors, Telecom Operators, Service Providers and Reseller/System Integrator/Web Agencies, with these partners on one platform it is possible to create a full SaaS distribution environment. Supply always meets demand and technology serves innovation.

LuxCloud’s range of applications is continually evolving, meeting the demands of the market. Your business will experience a smooth transition into the cloud.

milestones.description: Marco Houwen, Founder and CEO of LuxCloud, announces launch of Hosted365, a compilation of cloud services.
milestones.source_description: LuxCloud launches Hosted365, the world in your hand

milestones.description: LuxCloud, a market leader in cloud service distribution, added a new member to its team, CFO, Fryderyk Rdultowski.
milestones.source_description: LuxCloud strengthens team with new CFO

milestones.description: Jérôme Wittamer joins the board of LuxCloud, a market leader in cloud service distribution.
milestones.source_description: LuxCloud Brings a New Member on Board

milestones.description: Following the highly positive reception of the LuxCloud platform in 2011, the company will be sponsoring both WHD.india and WHD.asia, 2012.
Harry Singh joins cloud service distributor LuxCloud, as Managing Director for the Asia Pacific region.
milestones.source_description: LuxCloud appoints Managing Director for APAC

milestones.description:
Hosted365 Goes Live. 
Stay tuned for more information.
Hosted365, LuxCloud's virtual desktop, goes live as scheduled.

milestones.source_description: LuxCloud partners with KPN to jointly create a suite of cloud based products

milestones.description: LuxCloud announces its participation at the ICT Spring Europe 2012, Luxembourg, June 19-20
milestones.source_description: LuxCloud to attend ICT Spring Europe 2012

milestones.description: The LuxCloud Summit 2012; overwhelming response to event ensures repeat performance in 2013.
LuxCloud will be attending, and exhibiting on the Parallel's booth #819, at Microsoft WPC in Toronto, July 8-12, 2012.
milestones.source_description: Meet us on the Parallels' booth at the Microsoft WPC in Toronto, July 8-12, 2012!

milestones.description: LuxCloud, a global, market leader in cloud services distribution, will be attending and exhibiting at Hostingcon 2012, in Boston, Massachusetts, July 16-18.
Carlos Ramón will join cloud services distributor, LuxCloud, as Globalization Expert, and Advisor to the Board of Directors and CEO.
milestones.source_description: LuxCloud Appoints Globalization Expert, Carlos Ramón

milestones.description: LuxCloud partners with CakeMail to offer email marketing to their resellers.
milestones.source_description: Email Marketing Software CakeMail Now Available to LuxCloud Resellers

milestones.description: LuxCloud will be attending and exhibiting as a Gold Sponsor at the Parallels Summit 2012 APAC; the event takes place 21-22 September, in Singapore.
milestones.source_description: LuxCloud, Gold Sponsor at Parallels Summit 2012 APAC
